content.webTitle: Would it be more fun and cheaper to travel on a cargo ship?

fields.headline: Would it be more fun and cheaper to travel on a cargo ship?
fields.bodyText: Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it's up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday's paper. This week's question We visit grandchildren in the US twice a year and are fed-up with sitting in economy. We are thinking of travelling on a cargo ship. Would it be more fun and cheaper? Has anyone done it? Or have you any tips on how to make economy more bearable? What are your thoughts?
